name: Plague Harpy
description: The Plague Harpy is a medium monstrosity characterized by its sickly appearance and wings, representing disease and despair.
memorable: Spreads a deadly plague and can inflict despair with its mournful Dirge while flying with agility.
goals: To infect its enemies with disease and induce despair through psychological manipulation.
relations: Often encountered with other undead or plague-related creatures.
environment: Typically found in areas afflicted by disease or in dark, desolate locations.
strengths: Able to fly quickly, inflict disease, and manipulate foes with psychic abilities.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and wisdom limits its cunning in combat.
attacks: Executes a variety of attacks including a damaging bite, slashing talons, and psychic cawing.
most_powerful_ability: Virulence ability that spreads a dangerous plague among nearby creatures.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 90 feet, giving it strong sensory awareness.
skills: Skilled in perception, enabling it to detect threats effectively.
additional_information: Resistant to necrotic and poison damage
Can perform a Multiattack, enhancing its offensive capability
Dirge can dishearten enemies, providing tactical advantage
Limited Telepathy allows communication without a response
test_queries: menacing harpy that inflicts despair and disease
